entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 14 except minus 22 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 14 except minus 22 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 9 except minus 14 inland.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9 except minus 14 inland. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023
